titleStmt.title: The soules pilgrimage to a celestial glorie: or, the perfect vvay to heaven and to God. Written by J.M. Master of Arts
titleStmt.author: Monlas, John.
Maxwell, James, b. 1581, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes, and are to be sold by William Sheares at the signe of the Harrow in Britaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Monlas; sometimes attributed to by J. Maxwell--Cf. STC. Another issue, with cancel prelims. and first leaf of text, of Quadrivium Sionis, 1633--Cf. Halkett & Laing, 3rd ed. (1980).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Harrow in Britaines Bursse
